document.full_text: china's li na will try to become the first asian to win a grand slam singles title when she takes on holder francesca schiavone in saturday's french open final.
document.title: li bids for asian grand slam breakthrough
lines_and_colors: china's li na will try to become the first asian to win a grand slam singles title when she takes on holder francesca schiavone in saturday's french open final.
